template.name: Template SNMP McAfee Email Gateway (SMTP - POP3)
template.description: Created by Samuel Martins 2019-04-24 Version 1.00 https://github.com/slunart/Zabbix-Templates https://www.linkedin.com/in/slmartins/

item.name: Hostname
item.description: The hostname of the SNMP Agent module

item.name: SNMP Agent Version
item.description: The version of the SNMP Agent module

item.name: CPU Overall Usage
item.description: Shows the overall usage of one or more processors

item.name: Number of messages in the Logging Queue
item.description: Number of messages in the logging queue

item.name: Number of Messages in the Quarantine Queue
item.description: Number of messages in the quarantine queue

item.name: Number of Messages in the Deferred Queue
item.description: Number of messages in the deferred queue

item.name: Number of Messages in the MQM Queue
item.description: Number of messages in the MQM queue

item.name: Load Average
item.description: Shows the load average for the appliance

item.name: Memory Free
item.description: Shows the processor memory free

item.name: Memory Usage
item.description: Shows the processor memory usage

item.description: Connections that have been blocked

item.description: Total number of e-mail messages

item.description: Total number of potentially unwanted programs detected

item.description: The health of the POP3 protocol

item.description: Total data transferred through a proxy

item.description: Total connections used

item.description: Total number of viruses detected
